channel.title: Wc to 99
channel.description:
Hiya, ive decided to get 99 wc :P ive started at 70 with ivy, it runed whole day it was like 74 then the whole night it was 76... now its morning still 76.. but isnt there a faster way to get XP it seems it sooo slow
yes i bot ghehehe.

item.title: Wc to 99
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

I only bot if i need a quick advantage, or in a skill i hate, like runecrafting, but my rc’ing bot broke >.< so i haven’t botted recently…

Read full topic

item.title: Wc to 99
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:5, topic:411715”]Don’t bot overnight >.<

RULES OF BOTTING:
NEVER I repeat NEVER leave it on all night
Babysit your bot for 10ish minutes
Don’t wear very good stuff! You’ll attract attention. Something like camo would be good.
DON’T WEAR SKILLCAPES. People will talk to you about how long it took
Check in on it as often as you can.
Don’t start conversations before AFKing…
Don’t use crappy bots. Paid bots are better (so I hear).

Follow some of those rules and it will help ya :P[/quote]
I’ve had a bot go for 100+ hours straight, and no ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Wc to 99
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:10, topic:411715”][quote author=noobofiyer link=topic=512969.msg3724730#msg3724730 date=1314190606]

Botting is for faggots no offense, whats the point of playing the game and spending time in the game when you bot. Botting just removes the entire point of play the game(s). If you are playing a game and play it regularly then do it legitimately because botting is lame and is for people that don’t want to play the game just to bot and be noobs. Don’t be one of those people who bots because it fucks the whole Runescape Economy and players like me who actually want to play the game for fun it recks it for me and others.

Tips:

Tip One: Don’t bot because you’ll get banned and have to start again.
Tip Two: If you do bot then Bot ALOT so you get banned and we don’t have more botters in the game.

Other than that…

Good luck.

U know Runescape is full of botters, so why bother even playing then???
[/quote]

Did you know the world is full of people dying, so why bother even living then???[/quote]
Hes right…

Read full topic

What’s the point on getting a skillcape if YOU didn’t get it!

If you bot, it’s not really an achievement at all.
[/quote]
U dun b readin ma sig[/quote]

I couldn’t quote it.

item.title: Wc to 99
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:11, topic:411715”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=512969.msg3728011#msg3728011 date=1314421647]

Botting is for faggots no offense, whats the point of playing the game and spending time in the game when you bot. Botting just removes the entire point of play the game(s). If you are playing a game and play it regularly then do it legitimately because botting is lame and is for people that don’t want to play the game just to bot and be noobs. Don’t be one of those people who bots because it fucks the whole Runescape Economy and players like me who actually want to play the game for fun it recks it for me and others.

Tips:

Tip One: Don’t bot because you’ll get banned and have to start again.
Tip Two: If you do bot then Bot ALOT so you get banned and we don’t have more botters in the game.

Other than that…

Good luck.

U know Runescape is full of botters, so why bother even playing then???

Did you know the world is full of people dying, so why bother even living then???[/quote]

Whoa… What kind of comparison is that.[/quote]

He’s using a logical fallacy by saying he’s going to do it just because the mass population does it. Statistically, he probably also drinks underage, smokes pot, and depending on his ethnic background and where he lives, may even end up in prison one day. I replied with an equally fallacious statement, but in a far greater extreme with the hopes he might realize the ridiculousness of his statement. Alas, all the difference it’ll make…

Read full topic
